messages.title: YOUR VOTE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN GORDON
messages.content: Informing about tactical voting to beat the SNP.

messages.title: WHY WE NEED TO BACK COLIN
messages.content: He challenges the SNP on important local issues.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Colin Clark is positioned as challenging the SNP, with a focus on their record and independence.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Leaflet discusses tactical voting in Gordon to prevent an SNP win.

issues.brexitEurope: Highlighted choice between Boris who will deliver Brexit and Corbyn-Sturgeon who will bring more delay.

quotes.text: Only Colin Clark here stops the SNP.

images.caption: Leaflet with images of Colin Clark, campaign messages, and information about the election.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is primarily concerned with the tactical voting message against the SNP.
